channel.title: Autobiography of an American Yogi
channel.description: Yogi Sean shows us how little daily liberations can lead to profound spiritual awakening.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Autobiography of An American Yogi
channel.itunes:summary: Yogi Sean describes how spaciousness allows ease of being, divine guidance, and creative possibility.
channel.itunes:keywords: spirituality, personal transformation, spiritual practice, meditation, tonglen, loving-kindness, buddhism, bardo, reincarnation, vedas, upanishads, vivekananda, Ghandi, rimpoche, divine, love, god, bhakti, healing, happiness, bliss
